features: AE/FE lock, Audio Recording, Auto Power Save, Built-in Speaker, DPOF Support, digital noise reduction, display brightness control
batterydescription: 1 x Li-ion rechargeable battery - 650 mAh ( included )
connectortypes: 1 x USB, 1 x composite video/audio output
shootingprograms: Backlight, Beach/snow, Close-up, Copy, Dawn/dusk, Fireworks, Landscape, Museum, Night landscape, Night portrait, Panorama assist, Party/indoor, Portrait mode, Sports mode, Sunset & Moon
screendetails: LCD display - TFT active matrix - 1.5" - colour
continuousshootingspeed: 1.5 frames per second, 2 frames per second, 3 frames per second, 30 frames per second
exposuremodes: Automatic, Programme, aperture-priority, bulb, manual, shutter-priority
flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in mode, flash OFF mode, forced mode, rear curtain sync, red-eye reduction, slow synchro
operatingsystemsupported: Apple Mac OS 9, Apple Mac OS 9.2, Apple MacOS X 10.1.3 or later, MS Windows 2000, MS Windows 98 SE, MS Windows ME, MS Windows XP
